description: Excellencies,Distinguished guests,Ladies & Gentlemen, It is a great privilege to speak to youat the inauguration of the second edition of the Raisina Dialogue. Excellency Karzai Prime M
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Shared my thoughts on ‘The New Normal: Multilateralism and Multi-polarity' at the Raisina Dialogue in Delhi. 

Talked about aspects of India's foreign policy, our relations with our immediate neighbourhood & other nations.Elaborated on how India's strategic interests are shaped by our civilisational ethos of realism, co-existence, cooperation & partnership. 

Self-interest is not India's culture. Our actions, aspirations, democracy, demography will be an anchor for regional & global progress.

For the world, India will remain a beacon of peace & progress, stability & success and access & accommodation. 
http://nm-4.com/fy2z
